text: Palestro is a town and commune in Italy, in the province of Pavia. Palestro may also refer to: *Palestro (Milan Metro), a station on the Line 1 of Milan Metro *Palestro-class torpedo boat *Palestro-class ironclad floating battery * *Lakhdaria, formerly Palestro, a town in northern Algeria, in the Bouira Province ==See also== *Battle of Palestro *Ambush of Palestro
title: Palestro (disambiguation)
